sentences.en: We put some ointment and a bandage on his knee.
sentences.cn: 我们在他的膝盖上涂了些药膏，还缠了一条绷带。

sentences.en: Pawpaw ointment, made from pawpaw or papaya, is commonly used as a cure-all in Australia.
sentences.cn: 木瓜膏，由木瓜或者番木瓜提炼而成，在澳大利亚作为万灵药而被广泛使用。

sentences.en: Your new job sounds too good to be true — interesting work, high pay, short hours. Isn't there any fly in the ointment?
sentences.cn: 你的新工作听起来实在太好了——工作有趣味，待遇高，时间短。有什么美中不足的地方吗？
